condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Se refuerza y consolida el sistema nacional de protección social para atender las necesidades y fomentar la resiliencia de las familias más desfavorecidas, y empoderar a los adolescentes.

description.narrative: UNICEF strongly supported the Government in reducing vulnerabilities during the COVID-19 emergency situation and through focused actions was able to reach households with increased risk of poverty. Through capacity building efforts, NGO's and community workers were trained to further increase their reach and impact. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:17/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of advocacy meetings to assure the design of the Single Registry for Social Protection pilot.
Number of high level meetings to prepare for the National Development Conference 2020
Meetings with the political committee for approval of the Social Protection law to identify its modalities.
Number of high level meetings to advocate for the availability of a draft National Policy on Social Protection based on a legal framework.
Availability of a programme intervention to ensure social protection for vulnerable groups in emergencies
Number of high-level inter-ministerial meetings to advance the Social Protection law in coordination with the Political Committee for approval
Number of high-level meetings to advocate for the approval of the draft National Policy on Social Protection and the system management of data in social protection
Availability of a social protection programme to ensure support to vulnerable groups in the context of the COVID-19 pandemic
Number of vulnerable families including children, persons living with HIV, and persons living with disabilities received hygiene kits during COVID-19
Number of consultation rounds with government partners to discuss national social protection needs, actions and their implementation.
Covid-19 Emergency Social Protection programme approved with allocated funding
